name: bt-cracked.com
description: Based on cracked.com found here, but removing some additional annoyances especially for a mobile site. bt- prefixed styles are ones I post so I can put them on my phone so if they seem off, that is probably why.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("cracked.com") {
DIV[class="members FLC"],
DIV[class="box3Content FLC"],
UL[class="HorizontalList ThumbnailList2 FLC"],
div[style^="border-top:"],
#Header1a, 
.Header1a,
.Column2,
#Comments,
.Ad,
#RSS_Link,
.box3TopLeft,
.box3TopRight,
.box3BottomLeft,
.box3BottomRight,
.Copyright,
#fb_sliver,
.register_login_facebook,
#member-bar,
DIV[class="IR FLC"],
DIV[class="CL PT Breadcrumbs"],
.share_buttons_col_1,
#comments_section,
UL[class="FLC checkered_box"],
#inline-share-buttons,
#persistent-share,
#fb-friends-recent-activity,
.facebook,
#Account,
#Footer,
#NewsletterAndSearch,
.FooterLinks,
#FooterLinks,
#follow_me,
.social,
#social,
#fancybox-overlay,
#fancybox-wrap,
#persistentAd,
.shareBar,
.footer,
footer
{display:none!important;}
}
